        <general>

            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Csillagászat az ókori Görögországban Arisztotelészig</string>
            <string language="en-US">Astronomy In Ancient Greece Until Aristotle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Astronomie In Altem Griechenland Bis Aristoteles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Astronomie En Grèce Antique Jusqu'à Aristote</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Astronomia Em Greece Antigo Até Aristotle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Astronomia In Grecia Antica Fino A Aristotle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αστρονομία στην αρχαία Ελλάδα μέχρι Αριστοτέλη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Astronomía En Grecia Antigua Hasta Aristotle</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A korai görög csillagászat alapvető jellemzőinek megismerése. Arisztotelész csillagászati eredményeinek bemutatása.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Knowing the Basic Characteristics of the Early Greek Astronomy. Presentation of the Astrnomical Results of Aristotle</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">hurokvetés</string>
            <string language="en-US">loop cast</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">Arisztotelész</string>
            <string language="en-US">Aristotle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">geocentrizmus</string>
            <string language="en-US">geocentricism</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennen der grundlegenden Eigenschaften der frühen
griechischen Astronomie. Darstellung der Astrnomical Resultate 
Aristoteles</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Savoir les caractéristiques de base de 
l'astronomie grecque tôt. Présentation des résultats 
d'Astrnomical d'Aristote</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sabendo as características básicas da astronomia
grega adiantada. Apresentação dos resultados de Astrnomical de
Aristotle</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conoscere le caratteristiche di base 
dell'astronomia greca iniziale. Presentazione dei risultati di 
Astrnomical di Aristotle</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γνώση των βασικών χαρακτηριστικών της πρόωρης 
ελληνικής αστρονομίας. Παρουσίαση των αποτελεσμάτων 
Astrnomical Αριστοτέλη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Saber las características básicas de la 
astronomía griega temprana. Presentación de los resultados de 
Astrnomical de Aristotle</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schleife Form</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aristoteles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geocentricism</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
